languageKey.label: Configuration options for mail-to-news importers
Enter allowed from-email-addresses or part of the email addresses, comma separated. '@' allowes all email addresses.
This field has no function except for yourself, to identify this record.
The default settings are set in the Extension Manager. Here you can choose which fields you want to change for this specific importer
Enable only if your mailserver supports this
If your mailserver uses a self-signed SSL certificate you can allow this here
Leave 0 or empty to use defaults
Delete messages from email account after they are succesfully processed
Also delete messages that where rejected because of sender not in allowed senders or other reason. Do not use this on a shared email account!
In the default setting only the first text part is imported, which skips separate signature parts. Check this box to import and concatenate all text parts of multi-part messages.
Comma separated list of image extensions, like png,jpg,gif. Files with extensions used here will be filtered to news images and will NOT end up at the news file attachments.
Comma separated list of file extensions, like pdf,odt,doc, etc.
Mail2news can create news and blog records for the extensions tt_news and t3blog. You can only choose the options for which the extensions are installed (tt_news or t3blog)
Title or ID of default ttnews category for news items created by this extension, used if no (valid) category has been set in email message.
Title or ID of default t3blog category for blog items created by this extension, used if no (valid) category has been set in email message.
ID of the backend user to whom the created records will be assigned.
If checked, new records will only show on the website after a backend user unhides them.
Comma separated list of page IDs where the created content will be shown, of which the cache should be cleared for the new items to be shown.
